servicesPage.desc: All information about our services, prices, and agreements can be found here. We want to make it easy for you to understand what is included and how it works.

cleaning.title: Cleaning
cleaning.desc: We offer professional cleaning that covers all surfaces in your home, so you can relax and enjoy a clean and fresh living space.
cleaning.subtitle: What's included:
list: Kitchen: cabinets, stovetop, sink, countertops, fridge/freezer, microwave, and oven.
Laundry: bed linens and towels (2 loads included).

keyholding.title: Keyholding
keyholding.desc: We take care of keys and the supervision of your home when you are not there. Perfect for those who rent out or are away.
keyholding.subtitle: What's included:
list: Regular supervision: home inspection, airing, security checks.
Packages: Supervision every 4 weeks, Commuter Package 6 times/year.
Extra key handover: €15 per occasion (€30 with supervision, €15 with tax deduction).

about.subtitle: About us
about.title: Our mission and values
about.companyDesc: Trygg Hemservice offers cleaning and key-holding services in Torrevieja and the surrounding area, for both private homeowners and rental property owners. We simplify everyday life and provide peace of mind when you are not there.
about.personalDesc: My name is Jenny, and I run Trygg Hemservice. I have lived in Torrevieja for many years, and my experience has given me a strong sense of service, responsibility, and reliability, as well as solid local knowledge of the area and its needs.
